name: Kranti Tech Services Pvt Ltd
tagline: Shaping IT for Enterprises of Tomorrow
description:
Kranti Tech Services is a fast growing Software Solutions Provider, having expertise in delivering Software Solutions to organizations across a broad range of industries. We offer full product life cycle services, from architecture, design, development and integration to implementation and support.
We are a technology driven company, providing solutions on latest and emerging technology stacks and frameworks. Some of these are:

.NET (Azure, MVC 4.0, Web API, SOL Server, )
LAMP (Joomla, Drupal, Magento, Open Cart, Zend)
Mobility (Android, iPhone, Windows 8)
Cross Platform (Sencha)
Client Side (HTML5, Twitter Bootstrap)
Big Data/No-SQL/Graph DB (Apache Cassandra, Apace Hadoop Platform) 
Our Services :-
Bespoke Software Application Development
Product Engineering
Web Development & Digital Media Marketing 
 
IT Consultancy 
Application Maintenance & Support 
Mobility Solutions
